issue.title: extend access scope for PROXY
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

The idea is to add the possibility to choose one or n categorie of organism when defining a policy in the PROXY.

!! need to address the aggregation issue of policies (the same user could have two policies for one service)

to be more described.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Duplicated by and closes by #1156
